oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of tables set for Blue Gray Reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Board-mounted, sepia-tone photograph showing tables set with loaves of bread and pipes for the Blue Gray reunion. The reunion was the first joint gathering of Confederate and Union veterans organized in Tennessee.; Attendance was estimated to have been between 15,000-20,000 people with 14,000 of those being veterans. See image number chat084 for a program from the event.
